    def test_capture_home(browser):
        """

            browser.get(f"file:///{local_path.replace(os.sep, '/')}")
    
        with allure.step("📸 Capturar screenshot da interface inicial"):
            screenshot_path = "reports/screenshots/home.png"
            browser.save_screenshot(screenshot_path)
            allure.attach.file(screenshot_path, name="Home Screenshot", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG)
    
        with allure.step("🧪 Verificar presença de elementos esperados"):
